que2.text: The loudest animal is the African Elephant.

que3.text: Approximately one quarter of human bones are in the feet.

que4.text: The total surface area of a human lungs is the size of a football pitch.

que5.text: In West Virginia, USA, if you accidentally hit an animal with your car, you are free to take it home to eat.

que6.text: In London, UK, if you happen to die in the House of Parliament, you are entitled to a state funeral.

que7.text: It is illegal to pee in the Ocean in Portugal.

que8.text: You can lead a cow down stairs but not up stairs.

que10.text: Buzz Aldrin's mother's maiden name was 'Moon'.

que11.text: No piece of square dry paper can be folded in half more than 7 times.

que12.text: A few ounces of chocolate can to kill a small dog.
